thing-type.label: Nest Device Access
thing-type.description: A binding to interact with Nest Device Access

parameter.name: projectId
parameter.label: Project ID
parameter.description: This is the GCP Project that you created and integrated with the SDM API

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: This is the oAuth 2.0 Client ID associated with the provided Project ID

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: This is the Client Secret returned when setting up your oAuth 2.0 Client ID

parameter.name: authorizationToken
parameter.label: Authorization Token
parameter.description: This is the one time authorization token used to retrieve the Refresh and Access token to the SDM API

thing-type.label: Nest Device DoorBell
thing-type.description: A binding to interact with Nest Device DoorBells

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: This is refresh interval in seconds to update the nest device information. default to 300s

channel-type.label: Doorbell Name
channel-type.description: Doorbell Name

channel-type.label: EventImage
channel-type.description: Doorbell Static Image based on an Event

channel-type.label: ChimeLastEventTime
channel-type.description: The last time that the Door Chime was last pressed

channel-type.label: has_Chime
channel-type.description: Toggles whether a doorbell was pressed recently.. Refreshed at normal refresh interval for the Doorbell

channel-type.label: PersonLastEventTime
channel-type.description: The last time that a person was detected at the door

channel-type.label: has_Person
channel-type.description: Toggles whether a person was seen at the doorbell recently.. Refreshed at normal refresh interval for the Doorbell

channel-type.label: MotionLastEventTime
channel-type.description: Toggles whether Motion was seen at the doorbell recently.. Refreshed at normal refresh interval for the Doorbell

channel-type.label: has_Motion
channel-type.description: Toggles whether Motion was seen at the doorbell recently.. Refreshed at normal refresh interval for the Doorbell

channel-type.label: SoundLastEventTime
channel-type.description: Toggles whether a sound was heard at the doorbell recently.. Refreshed at normal refresh interval for the Doorbell

channel-type.label: has_Sound
channel-type.description: Toggles whether a sound was heard at the doorbell recently.. Refreshed at normal refresh interval for the Doorbell

channel-type.label: LiveStreamUrl
channel-type.description: Includes an rtsps video stream URL from the most recent event.. Refreshed at the next motion detected

channel-type.label: LiveStreamExpiration
channel-type.description: Livestream token expiration time

channel-type.label: LiveStreamExtensionToken
channel-type.description: Livestream token extension value

channel-type.label: LiveStreamCurrentToken
channel-type.description: Livestream current token value
